title: Theoretical investigation on degradation of CHCCH2OH by NO3 radicals in the atmosphere
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25472-25480
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03922J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jikang Gao, Meilian Zhao, Yaru Wang, Junchao Liao, Yunju Zhang
A detailed computational investigation is executed on the reaction between NO3 and CHCCH2OH at the CCSD(T)/cc-pVTZ//B3LYP/6-311++G(d,p) level.
